text: Jon Pardi is an American country music singer and songwriter. In 2015 he had his first number one song on Billboard's Country Airplay music chart. ==Early life== He was born on in Dixon, California. == Discography == === Singles === *"Dirt on My Boots" (2016) *"She Ain't in It" (2017) *"Tequila Little Time" (2021) ==Related pages== *List of country musicians from California ==Sources== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Country musicians from California Category:Singers from California
title: Jon Pardi
